sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The famous & renowned history of Morindos a king of Spaine who maryed with Miracola a Spanish witch: and of their seauen daughters, (rightly surnamed ladies with bleeding hearts:) their births, their liue and their deaths. A history most wonderfull, strange, and pleasant to the reader.
[46] p.
Printed [by E. Allde] for H R[ockett] and are to be solde at his shop in the Poultrie vnder Saint Mildreds Church, London : 1609.
Printers' names from STC. Running title reads: The history of king Morindos & Miracola a Spanish witch. Signatures: A-F⁴ (-F4). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

[46] p.
Printed [by E. Allde] for H R[ockett] and are to be solde at his shop in the Poultrie vnder Saint Mildreds Church, London : 1609.
